ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Help
ygData.msgSnippet: ... alot of games on a computer will notice most games come with a cd-key  and they codes are all different.  Second of all how can you lose a jewel case but
ygData.messageBody:
> Ok I have to step in here for a moment. First of all anyone who plays
alot of games on a computer will notice most games come with a >cd-key and
they codes are all different. Second of all how can you lose a jewel case
but not the cd that came in it? I have used many cd >games and have not
once lost the cd key for the game and I keep a record of my cd keys in case
the key becomes faded to the point i can >now longer read it. i.e: my
diabvlo 2 cd key the key is so faded i no longer can read it. Well that
just my 2 cents.
>
Well, lets just assume the person is new to computer games or thought this
one worked differently.
It's easy to lose the case if you keep the CD out to put in the computer or
you put it in a different place. I often lose my CD cases without losing the
CDs. and I often lose CDs but still find the cases.. Or I lose both
altogether. Some of us are just not that organized.
Give people the benefit of the doubt.
Go play and have fun. :-)
luv,
-Su
